## REASONING
The decision to modify our position in Johnson & Johnson (JNJ) to 1.05% reflects a strategic approach to capitalize on the company's strong earnings performance and positive clinical trial results. While there are valid concerns regarding high valuation metrics, the favorable macroeconomic environment supports our conviction that JNJ has the potential for price appreciation. This adjustment allows us to manage risk effectively while remaining positioned to benefit from the stock's growth trajectory.
